<voice 01976_19000703><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>...To that end, I thought that we could train a

19000704.キュウスケが\nしかたなく パーティに加わった。<se_nots System: Kyusuke has, unavoidably, joined the party!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>

602.<voice 02120_00000602><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02120_00000602><start_lip_sync n00049 _normal m00001>At any rate, that Great Dark Tree Leaf... Why would
Queen Agushna, on the verge of death, ask for such
a thing?<stop_lip_animation n00049 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000705.<voice 00218_19000705><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00218_19000705><start_lip_sync n00049 _normal m00001>Ooh, <pc> and Kyusuke, is it.<stop_lip_animation n00049 CLOSE_MOUTH>

608.<voice 00273_00000608><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00273_00000608><start_lip_sync n00049 _normal m00001>King Nikoroi went to the Abandoned Castle Palace's
throne room to deliver the leaf of the Dark Tree...
Please help him!<stop_lip_animation n00049 CLOSE_MOUTH>

609.<voice 00185_00000609><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00185_00000609><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>What is it, King Nikoroi?<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

611.<voice 00320_00000611><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00320_00000611><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>It's because of the leaf of the Dark Tree, isn't it.
Somehow it's affecting the surrounding air, I feel...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

613.<voice 00155_00000613><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00155_00000613><start_lip_sync n00026 _normal m00001>King Nashuroi! Princess Rita! Prince Nikoroi!<stop_lip_animation n00026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

614.<voice 00240_00000614><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00240_00000614><start_lip_sync n00026 _normal m00001>Queen Agushna is back!<stop_lip_animation n00026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

615.<voice 00559_00000615><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00559_00000615><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>Mother!! Welcome home!<stop_lip_animation n00050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

617.<voice 00857_00000617><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00857_00000617><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>I'm home, Nikoroi. It seems you missed me... I'm
sorry, you know.<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

618.<voice 00980_00000618><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00980_00000618><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>Yeah. Mother's illness is cured! You toughed it out!<stop_lip_animation n00050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

619.<voice 01043_00000619><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01043_00000619><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>I'm so happy! Just in time for father's birthday
next month. We can celebrate it together, can't we!<stop_lip_animation n00050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

624.<voice 01655_00000624><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01655_00000624><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>Are you okay? You're still sick... You're not better?<stop_lip_animation n00050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

627.<voice 00535_00000627><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00535_00000627><start_lip_sync n00026 _normal m00001>Are you all right? The whole time, you've seemed
like something is wrong...<stop_lip_animation n00026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

630.<voice 00967_00000630><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00967_00000630><start_lip_sync n00097 _normal m00001>Agushna. Running like that is bad for your health.<stop_lip_animation n00097 CLOSE_MOUTH>

631.<voice 01165_00000631><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01165_00000631><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>I'm fine, you known, dear. I'm not in pain at all.<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

633.<voice 01305_00000633><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01305_00000633><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>Mother's looking so much better!<stop_lip_animation n00050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

634.<voice 01355_00000634><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01355_00000634><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>I think mother getting well was a little bit of an
early birthday present from the Goddess to father.<stop_lip_animation n00050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

637.<voice 01605_00000637><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01605_00000637><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>Here... Do you want eat some together? Mom made it
for us...<stop_lip_animation n00050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

640.<voice 02095_00000640><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02095_00000640><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Sister was slowly going mad...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

641.<voice 02155_00000641><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02155_00000641><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>As mother's condition improved, my sister grew to
hate her...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

642.<voice 02235_00000642><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02235_00000642><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>And that led to the day of that tragedy.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

643.<voice 02295_00000643><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02295_00000643><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>Why do you think Princess Rita hated Queen Agushna...?<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

644.<voice 02357_00000644><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02357_00000644><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>I don't know... I thought she wanted our mother to
recover as much as I did...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

645.<voice 02475_00000645><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02475_00000645><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>I wonder if the leaf of the Dark Tree will reveal
anything...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000706.<voice 00240_19000706><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00240_19000706><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>...Mmm? Did you say something? Kyusuke?<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000707.<voice 00420_19000707><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00420_19000707><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc> has come to join us as well.
I'm reassured that you are here with us to the end.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

650.<voice 00575_00000650><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00575_00000650><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>...Late Mother. Please forgive me for keeping you
waiting so long.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

651.<voice 00645_00000651><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00645_00000651><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Mother, in accordance with your dying wish, I will
place the leaf of the Dark Tree in the throne room...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

652.<voice 00951_00000652><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00951_00000652><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>Whoa, what the!?<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

653.<voice 01080_00000653><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01080_00000653><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>This... This is...?<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

655.<voice 01201_00000655><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01201_00000655><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>No way... Aah, I can't!!<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

656.<voice 01214_00000656><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01214_00000656><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Aah, Nikoroi!? I can see a faint resemblance...
My little Nikoroi, all grown up...<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

658.<voice 01380_00000658><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01380_00000658><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>There's no mistaking it...
Just like that day.
I never thought I'd see you again.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

659.<voice 01510_00000659><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01510_00000659><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Apparently, I've put you through a lot.
But, Nikoroi, I'm just glad you're okay.<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

660.<voice 01620_00000660><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01620_00000660><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>So, Nikoroi, who are these people...?<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

661.<voice 01670_00000661><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01670_00000661><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>With me here are Kyusuke and <pc>.
They are the travelers who have helped me.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

662.<voice 01686_00000662><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01686_00000662><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>These men have brought me the
leaf of the Dark Tree...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

663.<voice 01780_00000663><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01780_00000663><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Oh... Is that so? Thanks to you, I've
woken up from a long sleep...
How can I ever thank you?<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

665.<voice 01950_00000665><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01950_00000665><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Tell me!
Tell me what happened in this
castle on that day 50 years ago!<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

666.<voice 02065_00000666><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02065_00000666><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Nikoroi... You're very fond of your sister, Rita,
aren't you. The truth is, the less you know, the
better...<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

667.<voice 02130_00000667><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02130_00000667><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>I am no longer a young child.
Please, tell me the truth.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

669.<voice 02260_00000669><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02260_00000669><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Nikoroi. You remember that Rita was
one of the White Ones with the
power to communicate with the Sanctuary, don't you?<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

670.<voice 02325_00000670><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02325_00000670><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Rita wanted to harness her power to
communicate with the Sanctuary to
take its power for herself.<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

671.<voice 02430_00000671><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02430_00000671><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>I don't know why she'd want to do
something like that. By the time King
Nashuroi and I figured it out, it was too late...<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

672.<voice 02460_00000672><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02460_00000672><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Rita took in more than she could handle.
She went mad. King Nashuroi tried
to stop her, so she killed him.<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28549.<voice 02510_00028549><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02510_00028549><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>I was nearly killed as well, but Rita's power sealed
me in this place for 50 years.<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

673.<voice 02600_00000673><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02600_00000673><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Oh, my... How horrifying.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

674.<voice 02661_00000674><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02661_00000674><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Nikoroi, as a member of the royal
family, you must fulfill our mission
to protect the sacred land.<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

675.<voice 02720_00000675><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02720_00000675><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>The Sanctuary is... This land's strength.
The heart of Eltona...<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9256.<voice 02760_00009256><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02760_00009256><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>If that land falls into the hands of evil,
this continent will be doomed to
perish, devoured by the Dark Tree.<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

676.<voice 02790_00000676><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02790_00000676><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>What will happen to the Sanctuary,
which Rita has been stealing power
from...? We must go and find out!<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9257.<voice 02820_00009257><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02820_00009257><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Nikoroi, Do you still have the Golden
Ring I dropped that day?<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29814.<voice 02835_00029814><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02835_00029814><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>The ring is the key that opens the door
to the sanctuary in the royal garden.<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

677.<voice 02890_00000677><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02890_00000677><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>If it's the golden ring you had, Mother, since that
day, I have carried it with me. We should go, at
once, to the Royal Garden.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

678.<voice 03040_00000678><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03040_00000678><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001><pc>, Kyusuke, come with
me to the royal garden.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29815.<voice 03100_00029815><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03100_00029815><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>The Royal Garden is the garden
behind the castle, but it's blocked by
sand and soil now. We'll have to make a detour to get there.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

679.<voice 03141_00000679><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03141_00000679><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>First, we'll go outside the walls.
Then we'll go through the ruins of
the northern residence and follow the signs to the royal garden in the back.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

680.<voice 03250_00000680><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03250_00000680><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Mother, do you have a moment?
Actually, I have a theory about why
my sister wanted power...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

681.<voice 03499_00000681><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03499_00000681><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>Oh my～, what a surprise, eh.<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

682.<voice 03529_00000682><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03529_00000682><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>I didn't think that the queen,
who was thought to be dead,
would show up like this.<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

684.<voice 03606_00000684><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03606_00000684><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>Well then, let's go!
Once we're outside the walls, we'll
head north past the ruins of the dwellings to the royal garden beyond!<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9258.<voice 00030_00009258><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00030_00009258><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>You're <pc>, aren't you?
I heard that you and King Nikoroi
found out about Princess Rita at the abandoned castle.<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9259.<voice 00068_00009259><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00068_00009259><start_lip_sync n00385 _normal m00001>You old coot! Don't speak the
name of that abominable princess...
You'll bring bad luck!<stop_lip_animation n00385 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9261.<voice 00271_00009261><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00271_00009261><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>Well, Princess Rita was a very
smart and kind girl...<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9262.<voice 00286_00009262><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00286_00009262><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>We used to fight all the time, and we
were never honest with each other,
but it was Princess Rita who brought us together, right?<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9263.<voice 00301_00009263><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00301_00009263><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>She'd say 'you look so good together'
with an innocent smile. That smile
made us honest.<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9264.<voice 00328_00009264><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00328_00009264><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>But when the gentle princess turned
violent, everyone feared it was fate, a
curse... and abandoned the castle.<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9265.<voice 00368_00009265><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00368_00009265><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>I was just a young soldier when
that tragedy occurred. I can still see
it in my mind's eye...<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9266.<voice 00398_00009266><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00398_00009266><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>After the attack on Lady Agushna...
Princess Rita came to her senses, and
was inexpressibly sad.<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9267.<voice 00428_00009267><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00428_00009267><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>Later, they found Princess Rita's shoes
at the edge of the fountain in the
royal garden.<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9268.<voice 00482_00009268><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00482_00009268><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>At the time, I was terrified, and all
I could think about was how far away
from that castle I was...<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9269.<voice 00512_00009269><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00512_00009269><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>Now, I think that... it was Princess
Rita who was suffering the most.<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

701.<voice 00204_00000701><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00204_00000701><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>...I remember now. This royal garden was my sister's
favorite place. As children, we used to play here
together...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

702.<voice 00400_00000702><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00400_00000702><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>How that girl managed to use the Sanctuary's power
for herself; the whole time I could never figure it
out, however...<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

703.<voice 00499_00000703><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00499_00000703><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>When Nikoroi showed me the diary that was in Rita's
room, I finally understood.<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

704.<voice 00577_00000704><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00577_00000704><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>The reason that girl sought the Sanctuary's power...
Was to cure me of my illness...<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

705.<voice 00693_00000705><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00693_00000705><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>What a thing to happen, isn't it. Poor Rita...<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

707.<voice 00857_00000707><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00857_00000707><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>No, I'm fine... I'm more concerned with fulfilling
the royal mission...<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

714.<voice 01076_00000714><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01076_00000714><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Well, <cs_pchero>. With this, we can enter
the sanctuary.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

715.<voice 01101_00000715><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01101_00000715><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Now, Nikoroi. Cast the Golden Ring into the fountain.
That should open the door to the Sanctuary.<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

717.<voice 00051_00000717><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00051_00000717><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>This is the Sanctuary...?<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

718.<voice 00294_00000718><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00294_00000718><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>What a beautiful place... It's hard to believe that
it's losing its sacred power...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

719.<voice 00339_00000719><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00339_00000719><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>That strikingly large, white tree...? By any chance,
could it be blocking the entrance to the Sanctuary?<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

720.<voice 00404_00000720><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00404_00000720><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Mother, what is that tree...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

723.<voice 00629_00000723><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00629_00000723><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Kukuku... Poor little Nikoroi!<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

724.<voice 00684_00000724><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00684_00000724><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>I wonder if you got that gullibility from your
father's side?<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

726.<voice 00857_00000726><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00857_00000726><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Fifty years... How long it's been! Thanks to that
cheeky little Rita, it's been a long time, but...<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

727.<voice 01011_00000727><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01011_00000727><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Now is the time, the continent of Eltona will be mine!<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

728.<voice 01066_00000728><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01066_00000728><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>You... Who the hell are you!?<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

729.<voice 01150_00000729><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01150_00000729><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>I am Araniad... To stain this continent with death
and despair, I was one born from the Dark Tree.<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

730.<voice 01246_00000730><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01246_00000730><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>My dear boy Nikoroi, were you happy to see your
mother? Did you feel like you had your family back?<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

731.<voice 01285_00000731><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01285_00000731><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>Hehehe... Your sickly mother left this world a long
time ago. I'm the one who killed her.<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

732.<voice 01315_00000732><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01315_00000732><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>I disguised myself as your mother to enter the castle.
To obtain the Golden Ring that would open the door
of the Sanctuary.<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

733.<voice 01765_00000733><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01765_00000733><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>But that Rita saw through my clever deception.<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9279.<voice 01795_00009279><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01795_00009279><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>Was it her fate as the White One... She tried to
cast me out by herself; I admired that. What's more,
she told no one of her mother's murder, you see.<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

734.<voice 01825_00000734><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01825_00000734><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>Underestimating the likes of that one little girl's
resistance and leaving her be was my mistake.<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000708.<voice 02285_19000708><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02285_19000708><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>That girl...! Despite killing that weak-minded King
Nashuroi and having finally got my hands on the
Golden Ring...!<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

735.<voice 02345_00000735><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02345_00000735><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>She traded her life to keep me here for 50 years!<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9281.<voice 02405_00009281><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02405_00009281><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>But no more! Now is the time for my wish to come
